problems.title: Palindrome Checker
problems.description: Write a function `isPalindrome` that takes a string as input and returns a boolean indicating whether the string is a palindrome. A palindrome reads the same backward as forward, ignoring case and non-alphabetic characters. Implement the function and ensure it passes all test cases provided in the main method.

problems.title: Fibonacci Calculator
problems.description:
Write a function `fibonacci` that takes an integer `n` as input and returns the `n`th Fibonacci number. The Fibonacci sequence is defined as:
- Fibonacci(0) = 0
- Fibonacci(1) = 1
- Fibonacci(n) = Fibonacci(n-1) + Fibonacci(n-2) for n >= 2

Implement the function and ensure it passes all test cases provided in the main method.

problems.title: Factorial Calculator
problems.description:
Write a function `factorial` that takes a non-negative integer `n` as input and returns the factorial of `n`. The factorial of `n` is defined as:
- Factorial(0) = 1
- Factorial(n) = n * Factorial(n-1) for n > 0

Implement the function and ensure it passes all test cases provided in the main method.

problems.title: Reverse String
problems.description: Write a function `reverseString` that takes a string as input and returns the reversed string. Ignore any leading or trailing whitespace, and preserve the case of the characters.

problems.title: Sum of Digits
problems.description: Write a function `sumOfDigits` that takes a non-negative integer as input and returns the sum of its digits. For example, if the input is 123, the function should return 6 (1 + 2 + 3).

problems.title: Maximum of Three Numbers
problems.description: Write a function `maxOfThree` that takes three integers as input and returns the maximum of the three numbers. Ensure the function works for negative numbers as well.

problems.title: Check Even or Odd
problems.description: Write a function `isEven` that takes an integer as input and returns a boolean indicating whether the number is even. A number is even if it is divisible by 2.

problems.title: Count Vowels
problems.description: Write a function `countVowels` that takes a string as input and returns the count of vowels (a, e, i, o, u, both uppercase and lowercase) in the string.

problems.title: Sum of Even Numbers
problems.description: Write a function `sumOfEvens` that takes an integer `n` as input and returns the sum of all even numbers from 1 to `n` (inclusive).

problems.title: Find Maximum
problems.description: Write a function `findMax` that takes an array of integers as input and returns the maximum value in the array.

problems.title: Count Words
problems.description: Write a function `countWords` that takes a string as input and returns the number of words in the string. Words are separated by spaces.

problems.title: Check Palindrome Number
problems.description: Write a function `isPalindromeNumber` that takes an integer as input and returns a boolean indicating whether the number is a palindrome. A palindrome number is the same when read forward and backward.

problems.title: Find the Smallest Number
problems.description: Write a function `findSmallest` that takes an array of integers as input and returns the smallest value in the array.
